name: mARbleMaze

screenshots.caption: One of our developers playing mARbleMaze, Level 4

short_description: Project mARbleMaze is an augmented reality minigame where the user uses a printed marker and his webcam to solve marble maze levels. Levels involve special fields like invisible walls and holes.
